Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Highly soluble poly[quinacridone-alt-benzothiadiazole] ( PQCDTB ) has been synthesized through the Suzuki coupling reaction by introducing planar quinacridone and highly absorbing benzothiadiazole.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly[quinacridone-alt-benzothiadiazole] |
| quinacridone |
| benzothiadiazole |

Explanation:

1. "poly[quinacridone-alt-benzothiadiazole]" (PQCDTB) is a specific type of material that has been synthesized, so it is a material name.
2. "quinacridone" is a component of the PQCDTB material, so it is also a material name.
3. "benzothiadiazole" is another component of the PQCDTB material, so it is also a material name.

Explanation:

1. "poly[quinacridone-alt-benzothiadiazole]" (PQCDTB) is a specific type of material that has been synthesized, so it is a material name.
2. "quinacridone" and "benzothiadiazole" are components of the PQCDTB material, but they are not themselves materials in this context. Therefore, they are not material names.
